thread.title: 5 Best City Sightseeing Cruises To View New York City
thread.title_full: 5 Best City Sightseeing Cruises To View New York City

author: admin
title: 5 Best City Sightseeing Cruises To View New York City
text:
Home > Cruise Travels > 5 Best City Sightseeing Cruises To View New York City 5 Best City Sightseeing Cruises To View New York City By admin on August 1, 2015 Pin It 
For first-time visitors to New York, city sightseeing cruises provide a chance and an excellent overview for orienting themselves while trying to learn something more about its architecture and history. 
No matter how many times you might have visited New York City, cruise rides serve as one of the most wonderful methods of experiencing the beauty of Hudson River and New York city skyline. 
Visitors of almost all ages will definitely enjoy the city sightseeing cruises that have the ability of accommodating the special requirements of passengers. Best City Sightseeing Cruises 
Some of the best sightseeing cruises that offer splendid view of New York City are as follows: City Sightseeing New York 
This is a 90 minute cruise that gives you the chance of discovering the cities of USA from different views while gracefully cruising past the skyline of Manhattan, New York. You get to see both the beautiful sides of the Manhattan Island. 
Cruising starts at Pier 78, New York and while cruising you can enjoy the exotic views of Chrysler Building, Empire State Building, Ellis Island, Brooklyn Bridge and Statue of Liberty. 
For further information: City Sightseeing New York Hornblower Cruises 
This is one of the best sightseeing cruises to enjoy stunning view of Manhattan during teatime. The cruise starts at Pier 40 and cruises down the Hudson river and enjoy the skyline of New York city. 
Various cruises offered by this Cruise line are Hornblower Infinity, Hornblower Hybrid, Hornblower Sensation, Hornblower Serenity, John James Audubon and Hornblower Esprit. 
For more information: Hornblower Cruises World Yacht At Pier 81 
This is a dinner and brunch cruise conducted by World Yacht which follows a route down Hudson River to have a stunning view of New York City. Guests of this cruise can enjoy the view from roof top while enjoying the four course meal. 
For further information: World Yacht At Pier 81 Circle Line Downtown 
This cruise combines the luxury and the comfort of yacht ride offering beautiful views of the city of New York. It is a one hour cruise that brings you face to face with the beauty, the history and the architecture of some of the most exotic cities of USA. 
Some of the best New York City sightseeing cruises provided by this cruise lines are Statue of Liberty Express, Statue by night, ZEPHYR happy hour and VIP statue by night. 
For more information: Circle Line Downtown Classic Harbor Lines 
These cruises are a little expensive but they are the best when it comes to getting the splendid sights of the cities of USA. This is the best private cruise for cruising water in NY harbor. 
These cruises are best for enjoying family vacations. They offer both ticketed public cruising and private cruising.
